MOMA & Alternative New York Exhibitions

  1. Home
  2. Exhibition

Title: Artist's Choice: Chuck Close, Head-On/The Modern Portrait

Date

Thu Jan 10 1991 until Tue Mar 19 1991

Location

Venue: MoMA

Artists and other Influencers
